summary: THE HEAD LIGHTS ON MY 2004 LEXUS RX330 ARE SO CONCENTRATED WITH LITTLE OR NO DIFFUSION OF LIGHT THAT WHEN THE ROAD IS NOT FLAT AND THERE IS A DIP I CAN'T SEE BEYOND 20 YARDS.  WHEN THE HIGH BEAMS ARE ON THERE ARE SHADOWS THROUGH THE ENTIRE FIELD OF VIEW.  THERE ARE DISTANT LINES OF DEMARCATION BETWEEN LIGHT AND DARK.  I FEEL THAT IT IS A REAL SAFETY ISSUE.  *JB
